cookies: By clicking “Accept”, you agree to the storing of cookies on your device to enhance site navigation, analyze site usage, and assist in our marketing efforts. View our Privacy Policy for more information.
city: You are choosing as your city.

hero.title: Delicious Sushi with Delivery in the Tri-City Area
hero.subtitle: Check out and love our rolls and sets! Fresh ingredients, authentic flavors, and the craftsmanship of our sushi masters make every roll a small work of art. Choose your favorite set, enjoy the delicate taste of fish and aromatic rice. Welcome to the world of Japanese culinary experiences – taste, explore, and enjoy every moment!

spring.title: SPRING Set!!!🌸
spring.description: Spring set: 5 types of rolls with avocado, shrimp, salmon, and peach for only 129 zł!
spring.backTitle: SPRING Set – Freshness and taste of the season! 🌸

backText.0: A sushi set full of freshness and spring flavors! 🌸 Delicate combinations of avocado, shrimp, salmon, vegetables, and fruits in light, crispy tempura. The perfect choice for a spring meal that will awaken your senses and energize you for warm days.
backText.2: • California Avocado with shrimp in panko (4 pcs.) – a delicate combination of avocado and crispy shrimp.
backText.3: • California Tanuki with spicy tuna (4 pcs.) – a bold mix of spiciness and fresh tuna.
backText.4: • California with salmon in tempura and peach (4 pcs.) – a combination of delicate salmon, crispy tempura, and the sweetness of peach.
backText.5: • California with Ebi mayo sauce, wrapped in cucumber (4 pcs.) – an elegant roll with shrimp, mayo, and refreshing cucumber.
backText.6: • Futomaki with tempura vegetables and spicy mayo (6 pcs.) – crispy futomaki filled with tempura vegetables, served with spicy mayo.

catering.title: Our Sushi Will Turn Any Event into a Remarkable Feast!
catering.description: Order catering for family gatherings, corporate events, or other special occasions
catering.backTitle: Discover the taste of perfect sushi at your event 🍱🍣

backText.0: Planning a business meeting, birthday, wedding, or an intimate gathering with friends? Nabo Gato Sushi Bar will make every moment exceptional with exquisite dishes that will amaze your guests. Our catering is not just food – it’s a culinary journey filled with fresh ingredients, original flavor combinations, and impeccable presentation.
backText.1: Professionalism and flexibility – we will tailor to your needs 🌟
backText.2: At Nabo Gato, we understand that each event is unique. That’s why our catering offering is fully tailored to your needs and expectations. Whether it’s a full menu with a variety of sushi sets or delicate finger food snacks, we ensure quality that leaves an impression. We operate throughout the entire Trójmiasto area, delivering culinary excellence right to your table.

tort.title: Sushi Cakes – A Unique Idea for the Biggest Lovers of Japanese Flavors
tort.description: If traditional cakes are not enough for you, discover our specialty – sushi cakes! A spectacular alternative that combines the exceptional taste of sushi with a striking appearance.

backText.0: Our sushi cakes are more than just food – they are a true centerpiece for any table. Multi-layered constructions, carefully arranged sushi pieces, and additions such as fresh herbs, shrimp, or caviar make each composition unique. Your guests will be delighted with both the taste and the look of the cake, which will become the focal point of your event.
backText.1: The perfect choice for special moments🥢
backText.2: Sushi cakes are a great way to make any occasion unforgettable. Whether you're hosting an intimate dinner or a large party, a sushi cake from ‘Nabo Gato’ will be a special addition. Surprise your loved ones or coworkers with something they definitely wouldn't expect, and make sure the memories of that day stay with them for a long time.
backText.3: Contact us and order your sushi cake today!✨
backText.4: Dreaming of a unique sushi cake? Call or message ‘Nabo Gato’ to place an order and discuss the details. We operate in Gdańsk, Gdynia, and the entire Tri-City area, delivering our masterpieces straight to your table. Your perfect sushi cake is within reach!

fivenabogato.title: 🍣 Create your set – get -20%!
fivenabogato.description: Choose 5 rolls of your choice, provide the secret phrase '5 Nabo Gato' – and the discount is yours! Delicious, convenient, and no unnecessary formalities.
fivenabogato.backTitle: Your set – your rules. And 20% off on top! 🍣

backText.0: Dreaming of the perfect flavor combination? Now you have the chance to create your own unique set with 5 delicious rolls – choose from avocado, shrimp, salmon, spicy tuna, or crispy tempura! 🍣
backText.1: Simply provide our secret phrase '5 Nabo Gato' when ordering and get a 20% discount on the entire set! 😍
backText.2: Perfect for hanging out with friends, a family meal, or just for yourself – a taste that will wow everyone! 🎉 A tasty way to save and enjoy an exceptional meal!

happyhours.title:
Happy Hours:
- 20 % on all rolls!
happyhours.description: From Monday to Thursday, 12:00-15:00 – delicious rolls with a 20% discount!
happyhours.backTitle: Happy Hours – Your favorite rolls with 20% off!

backText.0: Feeling hungry? We have great news for you! Every Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, and Thursday between 12:00 and 15:00, we have ‘Happy Hours’ – a special time when all rolls on our menu taste even better with 20% off!
backText.2: 💥 What’s on promotion? All rolls on the menu!
backText.3: 💥 How to get the discount? Just place an order during these hours – the discount will be applied automatically.

stickers.title:
Stickers = Savings!
Collect 10 and get 60 zł off! 🎁
stickers.description: For every 100 zł spent – 1 sticker. Collect 10 stickers and receive 60 zł discount on your next order!
stickers.backTitle: Each order brings you closer to 60 zł off! Just collect 10 stickers! 🎁

backText.0: Want to make every order more rewarding? Join our promotion!
backText.2: • For every 100 zł on your receipt – 1 sticker
backText.3: • Collect 10 stickers – and get 60 zł discount on your next order!
backText.4: • If you're ordering by phone or online, let us know you have 10 stickers – mention it during the call or write it in the order comments, and we'll apply the discount during checkout.

ramen.title: Ramen ラーメン
ramen.subtitle: Japanese soup with wheat ramen noodles and aromatic broth. Traditionally served with toppings such as egg, meat, vegetables, and spices.

0.name: Tan Tan Men Ramen
0.description: rich, mildly spicy beef-chicken broth with nutty sesame tare, spicy minced beef, marinated egg, blanched pak choi, grilled brown mushrooms, nori, chili oil, ramen noodles

1.name: Shoyu Ramen
1.description: clear beef-chicken broth with katsuobushi tare, chashu pork belly, marinated egg, grilled corn, narutomaki, nori, garlic oil, ramen noodles

hosomaki.title: Hoso-maki (6pcs) 細巻き
hosomaki.subtitle: Maki sushi rolls with one ingredient and wasabi. Minimalism and tradition in every portion – perfect for those who love pure flavors.

0.name: Salmon
0.description: Traditional roll with salmon and wasabi. Simple and classic.

1.name: Tuna
1.description: Delicate tuna in classic hoso-maki style with wasabi.

2.name: Shrimp
2.description: Boiled shrimp with a hint of wasabi, wrapped in classic rice and nori.

3.name: Tamago
3.description: Sweet Japanese tamago omelette – a mild alternative in classic maki form.

4.name: Surimi
4.description: Crab stick (surimi) with wasabi, wrapped in rice and nori.

5.name: Vegetables
5.description: Vegetarian option with a mix of (cucumber/kanpyo/oshinko/avocado) classic Japanese vegetables and wasabi.

nigiri.title: Nigiri (2pcs) 握り寿司
nigiri.subtitle: Traditional sushi – hand-formed rice portions topped with fish or vegetables. The classic simplicity and taste of Japan.

0.name: Avocado, kanpyo, sesame
0.description: Delicate combination of avocado, marinated gourd, and sesame – a vegetarian nigiri full of freshness.

1.name: Salmon
1.description: Classic nigiri with raw salmon – the pure taste of fish on lightly seasoned rice.

2.name: Salmon Edomae
2.description: Marinated salmon in the Edo style, with a hint of umami – a traditional technique from Tokyo.

3.name: Salmon Kombu
3.description: Salmon marinated in kombu seaweed – deep, oceanic flavor with creamy texture.

4.name: Salmon Nabogato
4.description: Richly served salmon with garnishes – a full portion of flavor and contrasts.

5.name: Tuna
5.description: Raw tuna – a classic among nigiri, slightly sweet and meaty.

6.name: Tuna Edomae
6.description: Marinated tuna in the Edo style – intense flavor and soft texture.

7.name: Eel
7.description: Grilled eel with kabayaki sauce – sweet-salty treat with a rich aroma.

8.name: Shrimp
8.description: Cooked shrimp placed on rice – delicate, slightly sweet nigiri.

9.name: Dorade
9.description: Delicate and slightly fatty dorade – an elegant choice for gourmets.

10.name: Tamago
10.description: Sweet Japanese omelette – perfect as a light, traditional snack.

11.name: Squid/shrimp tempura
11.description: Crispy tempura with squid or shrimp – a contrast of textures on soft rice.

6.name: Edamame Beans

7.name: Wakame Salad
7.description: Marinated wakame seaweed with sesame – fresh, oceanic flavor with a hint of sweetness.

menu-modal.title: Choose a city
menu-modal.text:
We don't know where you are. To place an order, we need to know your location.
Please choose your city.

about.title: ABOUT NABO GATO
about.subtitle:
We are a small team that simply enjoys what we do. Every day, we prepare food with care – the kind of food we would love to eat ourselves. We value a relaxed, friendly atmosphere where our guests feel comfortable.
Nabo Gato is a place created with heart – not with big words, but with great attention to detail.
about.contentTitle: NABO GATO Sushi Bar – a taste you’ll remember for long! 🍣
about.contentDescription: Visit NABO GATO Sushi Bar in Gdańsk and Gdynia! We offer fresh sushi including classic rolls, special sets, and vegan options. Every dish is crafted with passion, blending traditional flavors with a modern twist.
about.backSubtitle: Our guests' opinions mean a lot to us. They help us understand what we’re doing well and what we can still improve. Thank you for sharing your impressions!

communication.title: Communication
communication.subtitle: Here you will find all the information on how to best get in touch with us and reach our location. Choose the method that is most convenient for you.
